        public boolean checkPositions(int posX,
                              int posY,
                              int width,
                              int height)
        Checks the between spaces to see if there is something there
        Parameters:
        posX - The X position in pixels
        posY - The Y position in pixels
        width - The width in pixels
        height - The height in pixels
        ignoreMaterial - True if I want to ignore the materials that are there of false otherwise
        Returns:
        false if there is something there or true if it's empty
